name: Hi, I'm Abby Jones
tagline: There's a song stuck in my head.
body:
## GitHub Tour
Here's what I've been working on organized by language/framework.

-------------
### Ruby on Rails
I've spent the most time using Ruby and Ruby on Rails, so this is where I feel most at home. 
*  [Preschool On Rails](https://github.com/AbbyJonesDev/PreschoolOnRails) - solo client project
*  [The Odin Project](https://github.com/AbbyJonesDev/theodinproject) - contributions to open source project
*  [AJAX Puppy HQ](https://github.com/AbbyJonesDev/AJAX_Puppy_HQ) - API for student use
*  [Songwriter Project](https://github.com/AbbyJonesDev/songwriter_project) - solo client project
*  [Personal Website](https://github.com/AbbyJonesDev/adventures) - my personal website

### Static HTML/CSS
With a little jQuery/JavaScript thrown in for good measure.
*  [Doo-B-Gone](http://www.doo-b-gone.com/index.php) - client project; site redesign with responsive layout
*  [Here We Grow Lincoln](http://www.herewegrowlincoln.com) - solo client project (my first website)


_________________
_________________
## Favorite Tools/Frameworks

_________________
### CSS
* [SASS](http://sass-lang.com/)
* [Foundation](http://foundation.zurb.com/)
* [Bootstrap](http://getbootstrap.com/)
* [Bootstrap's Custom Install Generator](http://getbootstrap.com/customize/)

### JavaScript
* [JSHint](http://jshint.com/)
* [jQuery](https://jquery.com/)

### Ruby
* [RSpec](https://relishapp.com/rspec) - for testing
* [Factory Girl](https://github.com/thoughtbot/factory_girl) - also for testing
* [Devise](https://github.com/plataformatec/devise) - for authentication
* [Bullet](https://github.com/flyerhzm/bullet) - for making queries better
* [Jazz Hands](https://github.com/nixme/jazz_hands) - for exploring/debugging
* [Letter Opener](https://github.com/ryanb/letter_opener) - for catching/inspecting emails
* [Faker](https://github.com/stympy/faker) - for creating fake data

______________
______________
## To Explore
A not-at-all-comprehensive list of things I want to learn more about and experiment with.
_________________

### JavaScript
* [AngularJS](https://angularjs.org/)
* [React](https://facebook.github.io/react/)
* [Meteor](https://www.meteor.com/)

### Everything Else
* eCommerce
* WordPress
* Java
* Mobile
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
